about_the_game:
Design an inspiring space for Sims to hone their creative skills with The Sims™ 4 Artist Studio Kit. Your easel is surrounded by the tools of your trade: brushes, paint cans, still-life references, and more all scattered artfully, just the way you like it. You know your studio — its clutter, its drawers and shelves, and every drop of splattered paint — because you’ve left your mark on it, just like your canvas.

KEY FEATURES

  • An Artist’s Tools — Give your Sims more ways to express their creativity. There’s a new easel, tablet, and woodworking table for Sims to use in their artistic endeavors. Place inspiring still-life references, a backdrop, and other props to really help your creativity flow.

  • Artful Décor — Add an artistic flourish to your canvas and your studio. Add paint splatter to the ground and clutter items like palettes, cans, tubes, brushes, and stacked sketch books to every shelf and corner.
detailed_description:
What's included in this pack


About the Game

Design an inspiring space for Sims to hone their creative skills with The Sims™ 4 Artist Studio Kit. Your easel is surrounded by the tools of your trade: brushes, paint cans, still-life references, and more all scattered artfully, just the way you like it. You know your studio — its clutter, its drawers and shelves, and every drop of splattered paint — because you’ve left your mark on it, just like your canvas.

KEY FEATURES

  • An Artist’s Tools — Give your Sims more ways to express their creativity. There’s a new easel, tablet, and woodworking table for Sims to use in their artistic endeavors. Place inspiring still-life references, a backdrop, and other props to really help your creativity flow.

  • Artful Décor — Add an artistic flourish to your canvas and your studio. Add paint splatter to the ground and clutter items like palettes, cans, tubes, brushes, and stacked sketch books to every shelf and corner.
legal_notice: *Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. For PC, see minimum system requirements for the pack.
